QuestData.Title: Gods like Shiny Things
QuestData.Description: Soo-say said we go with you. You be nice, okay?$B$BOoh, ooh! We know! We can make Soo-say happy if we bring back more offerings for shrine! We not need to go far, there's always stuffs to dig up around village... just look for sparkles in dirt!$B$BLet's go! Let's go! More offerings for shrine!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 6 of the treasures that Lafoo digs up and bring them to High-Oracle Soo-say in Rainspeaker Canopy.$B$BIf you lose Lafoo's Bug Bag, speak to High-Oracle Soo-say in Rainspeaker Canopy.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hello dryskin. You get along with Lafoo good?
QuestData.RewardText: Shinies for the Great Rain Stone! Good! Good!$B$BWe offer these right away. Lafoo thought of this, yes? He a very smart Rainspeaker.
